name: Sovay Apartment
description:
This is an assignment submission for Goldsmtihs IS71073B: Interactive Narrative and Digital Storytelling

Genre: Visual Novel

Tools used: Unity, Ink

Subject: Cyberpunk/Dystopian

You've had enough of this society. You've been suffering for so many years to save money to move into a Sovay Apartment developed by a "company", away from the chaos, competition, greed and filth of the world. Finally, the move-in day has come, and your new life in Sovay Apartments is unfolding ......

As a visual novel, you can discover the truth about the apartment by making choices, one cycle at a time. The linked Youtube video shows just one of the story lines, Good End, Bad End, Normal End, with over 10 different endings and story lines to explore!
